com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations

Class Annotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.annotations.Annotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Marker, MultiPoint

    public abstract class Annotation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>
    Annotation is an overlay on top of a MapView, from which Polygon, Polyline and Marker are derived.

    it manages attachment to a map and identification, but does not require content to be placed at a geographical point.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public long getId()

        Gets the annotation's unique ID.

        This ID is unique for a MapView instance and is suitable for associating your own extra data with.
